name: Remote Workshop Templates
description:
I got tired of copy/pasting all of my starter workshop materials into a new Figma project, so I made this instead!


In this project, you'll find..

  • A quick-start guide, for people unfamiliar with Figma
  • 8-color variations of Post-It Components
  • 8-color variations for Dot-Voting
  • A modified, remote-friendly Crazy Eights exercise
  • Impact / Difficulty prioritization matrix framework with step-by-step guides on how to


I'll be adding to this as I create new exercises for the workshops I run. Let me know what's missing from your process and I'll add it ASAP. :)
